description: Applying a cumulative update to the Winre.wim image on top of the Safe OS update can result in the modification of various files located in the system32 directory. While such an update may not be mandated by Microsoft's documentation concerning offline updates to the Winre image, it does maintain relevance for system integrity and ensures that the Winre environment is up-to-date. This operation may alleviate concerns related to outdated recovery images, which can impact system recovery procedures during critical failures.
